Uses of Interface
org.schema.game.mod.listeners.ModListener

  • Packages that use ModListener 
    Package Description
    org.schema.game.mod
    A package containing the classes dedicated to the modding API.
    org.schema.game.mod.listeners
    This package contains all listeners provided by the modding API of StarMade.

    • Uses of ModListener in org.schema.game.mod

      Classes in org.schema.game.mod that implement ModListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Mod
      This class provides hooks for a mod.
      Methods in org.schema.game.mod with parameters of type ModListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Mod.removeListener$7ffc5073(ModListener ModListener)
      Removes hooks for a listener from this mod.

    • Uses of ModListener in org.schema.game.mod.listeners

      Subinterfaces of ModListener in org.schema.game.mod.listeners 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BlockInitializationListener
      This listener fires when a mod should register it's blocks.
      interface  NetworkInitializationListener
      This listener fires when a mod should register it's networking related classes.
      interface  PlayerStateListener
      This listener is used to place hooks on players.
      interface  SegmentControllerListener
      This listener provides hooks for SegmentControllers
